meanings.definition: A document serving as evidence for a transaction or authorization.
meanings.sent1: I kept the voucher as proof of my purchase.
meanings.sent2: She handed the voucher to the cashier to get a discount.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a voucher that solved the mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a voucher of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The voucher fluttered in the wind, a reminder of the deal.

meanings.definition: A coupon or ticket that can be exchanged for goods or services.
meanings.sent1: He used the voucher to buy a new book.
meanings.sent2: The concert ticket was like a voucher for a night of music.
meanings.sent3: The voucher for free ice cream made her day.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was a voucher for a joyful heart.
meanings.sent5: The golden voucher gleamed, promising a special treat.

meanings.definition: To provide a voucher for payment or reimbursement.
meanings.sent1: The company will voucher your travel expenses.
meanings.sent2: She decided to voucher the cost of the repair.
meanings.sent3: He tried to voucher his time spent on the project.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness vouchered her as a true friend.
meanings.sent5: The stars vouchered for the beauty of the night sky.
